patterns: i would like to hear more
responses: About 45 years ago, we began our journey of a promising success in building houses and helping build homes. We believe we experience satisfaction in the truest sense only when our customers are happy. Nurturing a legacy of trust for 3 generations now, our promise has met Zero Missed Deadlines. Punctuality is not a lost virtue. We stand testimony to that. Steering clear of debts on our credit, we have built a Zero-Debt Company, Ahad has delivered a whopping 226 projects to about 6,480 customers. Homes raise and age families through different time spans.'Read More'

MAKING LIVES A MASTERPIECE!

Ahad Opus is an exclusive residential offering of luxurious 2 & 3 BHK apartments. It is a magnificent, high-rise G+ 17 residential apartment of 232 units spread over 2.5 acres just 100 M from Main Sarjapur road. It is sandwiched between the upcoming (nearing completion) Wipro Campus and the RGA Tech park. This meticulously planned project offers you maximum open space with panoramic views and a plethora of lifestyle amenities.
